content: Compose a short story where every word starts with the letter 'm'.

Misty morning mist muffles meadows, merging mountains' might. Majestic monarchs meander, murmuring mysterious melodies. Mellow moonlight massages midnight's mantle, making magic manifest. Mischievous mice mimic melodic mandolins, mastering mesmerizing motifs. Marvelous mirrors multiply magestic meteors, manifesting mystical mirages. Million mellow moons materialize magically, multiplying mystery's mood._MAGIC_M
